chat.title: Chat
chat.description: Ask questions and get responses from popular AI models with web search and deep thinking.
chat.headline: How can I help you today?

composer.placeholder: What do you want to know?

dropzone.title: Drop your files here
dropzone.description: Drop your files here to add them to the conversation

summarize.label: Summarize
summarize.prompt: Please provide a concise summary of the following text, highlighting the key points and main ideas while maintaining the core message. Please ensure the summary is clear and well-structured: The Industrial Revolution was a period of major industrialization and innovation during the late 18th and early 19th centuries. The Industrial Revolution began in Great Britain and quickly spread throughout Western Europe and North America. This period saw the mechanization of manufacturing, development of factory systems, and significant technological innovations in areas like textile production, steam power, and transportation. It led to major social changes including urbanization, the rise of a new working class, and eventual improvements in living standards. However, it also brought challenges like poor working conditions, child labor, and environmental pollution.

analyze.label: Analyze
analyze.prompt:
Please analyze this dataset and provide key statistical insights, trends, and patterns. Include relevant metrics, correlations, and any notable outliers: Year,GDP,Population,Life_Expectancy
1960,543.3,179.3,69.7
1970,1073.3,203.3,70.8
1980,2862.5,226.5,73.7
1990,5980.3,248.7,75.4
2000,10284.8,281.4,76.8
2010,14964.4,308.7,78.7
2020,20893.7,329.5,77.3

code.label: Code
code.prompt: Write a function that takes a list of numbers and returns the sum of all the numbers in the list. The function should be written in Python.

brainstorm.label: Brainstorm
brainstorm.prompt: Generate a list of 10 creative ideas for a new product or service. Each idea should be unique, innovative, and have a clear market opportunity. Please provide a brief explanation for each idea.

surprise.label: Surprise me
surprise.prompt: Please surprise me with a random fact or interesting tidbit. I'm curious about anything and everything!

agent.title: Agents
agent.description: Personalizable AI agents that operates on your knowledge base and helps with complex tasks.

headline.title: Agents are coming soon!
headline.subtitle: We're working hard to bring you the best AI agents experience. Stay tuned for updates!

image.title: Image generation
image.description: Create visuals from text descriptions using different models like SDXL or Midjourney.

composer.placeholder: A cat shipping its startup in minutes, not hours...

history.title: History
history.description: View your image generation history, and see how your images have evolved over time.

empty.title: No images yet
empty.description: There are no images generated, start by describing what you want to see.

fox.label: Mystic Fox
fox.prompt: A silver fox with glowing eyes emerging from a misty enchanted forest at twilight, surrounded by floating lanterns

penguin.label: Dapper Penguin
penguin.prompt: A penguin in a tuxedo and monocle sipping tea at an ice bar, with northern lights dancing in the background

raccoon.label: Tech Raccoon
raccoon.prompt: A raccoon wearing glasses and a hoodie, coding on multiple screens in a cozy treehouse office filled with snacks

elephant.label: Zen Elephant
elephant.prompt: A baby elephant meditating under a giant baobab tree at sunrise, with butterflies landing on its trunk and ears

dolphin.label: Cosmic Dolphin
dolphin.prompt: A dolphin leaping through space, leaving a trail of stardust and nebula colors, with distant planets visible in the background

pdf.title: Chat with PDF
pdf.description: Extract insights and answers by chatting directly with your PDF documents.

command.search: Type a command or search for a document...

upload.description: Upload a PDF file by dragging and dropping it here, from url or by selecting a file. Let's chat!

error.api: Failed to upload the PDF file. Please try again.
error.notFound: Could not access the PDF file. Please check the URL and try again.
error.unauthorized: Please sign in to upload PDF files.

signIn.title: Sign in required
signIn.description: Create a free account or sign in to upload and chat with your PDF documents.

upload.success: The PDF file has been uploaded successfully!

confirm.title: Confirm document details
confirm.description: Please confirm the details of the document you are uploading.

loading.title: Bear with us...
loading.description: We're processing your document, this may take a few seconds.

preview.noDocuments: No documents found to preview, please upload a document or try again later.

composer.placeholder: Ask me anything about this document...
composer.empty: Start by asking a question. You can also preview the document by clicking on the preview button.

download.success: The PDF file has been downloaded!

processing.indexingDescription: We're analyzing your document to enable intelligent search and Q&A. This usually takes a few seconds.

tts.title: Text to speech
tts.description: Convert text to natural-sounding speech with customizable AI voices.

composer.placeholder: Start typing here or paste any text you want to turn into lifelike speech...

speed.description: Controls the speed of the generated speech. Values below 1.0 will slow down the speech, while values above 1.0 will speed it up. Extreme values may affect the quality of the generated speech.

stability.description: Increasing stability will make the voice more consistent between re-generations, but it can also make it sounds a bit monotone. On longer text fragments we recommend lowering this value.

similarity.description: High enhancement boosts overall voice clarity and target speaker similarity. Very high values can cause artifacts, so adjusting this setting to find the optimal value is encouraged.

speakerBoost.description: Boost the similarity of the synthesized speech and the voice at the cost of some generation speed.
